document.body:
Login / Sign up for FREE! / 5,567 Users Online!
Burger Restaurant 2 Games for Girls Playpink.com offers 69 burger restaurant 2 games for girls. The games are always free for you to play and we also have others including dress up games, cooking games, makeover games, barbie games, and decorating games!
Burger Restaurant 2 Make burgers as according to what your customers want to keep it going. You need to make a certain amount for a particular day. So get your hands greasy and make some money! Top Chef Restaurant In a restaurant, a few customer come and you have to serve them what the want. You have a limited time and you have to do it quick. Have fun. Mina's Restaurant Training Lovely Mina applied for a manager job, but surely everyone knows that you can\'t get a job like this without serious experience, so help our cute friend get on her road to success, and start training her to become a manager in this business, that requires a lot of skill and dedication. Ivana's restaurant decoration Meet Ivana the sweet girl who plans to open a new restaurant in this woman's day and needs your help for decoration. She wants to make sure everything will be perfect before the grand opening and also like to get appreciate from her friends. Let's use your decoration skills and designing ideas for planning, design and manufacturing this new restaurant and make it so special that every one praise the work. Have fun girls! Pet Restaurant Welcome to Pet Restaurant. I am taking a vacation and leaving you to replace me in the kitchen. You have to feed all the animals that walk in the restaurant with the right food they order. Learn their language so you can feed them the right meal. Cash in and make profit to go to the next level. Good Luck! Mushroom Melt Burger You are cheese, mushrooms, burgers and fries stacked to the sky! Get happy with this full meal of fun and excitement. Customize everything and dress it up right for a delicious one of a kind taste adventure. Leas Fast Food Restaurant Hi I am Lea, and I just got a job working in this brand new fast food restaurant, but it is not easy! Help me do my new job by greeting customers, taking and delivering their orders, and cleaning up after they leave. Thanks girls! Pet Food Restaurant For this game, you have to feed all the pets who goes in your restaurant. Yes this is a restaurant reserved to the pets only. Let see how fast you are to feed them. Burger Mania You are running a hot burger shop in the city. Lots of customers want burger. You are the only one person running the shop. Serve your customer within the time durations and satisfy them to come again and again. Mina's Restaurant Today Mina is applying for a job as a manager in a really cool restaurant, but she requires a little bit of experience before she gets accepted. So, let Mina's Restaurant Training begin! Pay attention to your customers and cash in the money. Mina really needs to earn a lot these days, because summer is just around the corner and she would like to go shopping for summer clothes, swimwear, because this year we'll definitely see Lisa and Mina on the Beach, once again, as they both really love the sea. So, your management skills are most needed today to train this lovely blonde girl for running a whole restaurant and many picky clients, too, of course. Yummy Burger Juicy all beef hamburgers, hot off the grill! Cooked, topped and served just the way you like'em. Pick from a yummy assortment of vegetables and condiments as well as custom sesame, kaiser, or rye buns then dig in to fun times and great food. Lora Burger Shop Lora was dreaming to open a burger shop. Dream come true. Very tasty burgers. Special Burger Create a delicious burger in the fun cooking game, Special burger. Start with the basic bun, hamburger patty and some lettuce. Next you will be able to customize the burger by adding toppings and accessories. Pick some tasty cheese to put on your burger, choose some fries and a drink to wash it down. You will have fun creating a scrumptious burger in this awesome game! Tasty Burger Create your own custom mouth watering hot off the BBQ burger for a delicious, traditional meal. You have to choose from each category what you prefer to eat for a small lunch. Bon appetit! Enjoy your meal! Delicious Chicken Burger My favorite meal! I could eat hamburger with french fries all day, you must agree that it’s a perfect combination. The secret of a delicious hamburger is the meat you use and how it’s prepared. In this game we will show you how to cook an amazing hamburger with healthy and tasty meat. Cook some vegetables: onions, garlic, tomato, then add the meat and some condiments. You have mix all the ingredients until it becomes soft, like a dough. This meat have to be cooked before it can be eaten. Prepare your hamburger with this kind of meat, add some carrots, lettuce and maybe some sauce. Here you go, a perfect lunch on a sunny day! Enjoy this cooking game online girls! PAGE « 1 2 3 4 5 NEXT» NEW GAMES
